name: Adrift (Jam Version)
description:
The jam game for "A Jam with Blawnode #1"!

A 5-day jam game by Blawnode, Ajoeb "KingKelpo" Gaasim, Nazsgull, NoStereo, redsti and Gene "sound_digitator" Chaban.

Art: Blawnode, KingKelpo.

Code: Nazsgull, redsti.

Music: NoStereo.

SFX: sound_digitator.

Made with Unreal Engine 5.0.1.
